New Records: India scored 196/5, their highest total in T20Is with none of their top five batters scoring a fifty
Key Match Events: Rishabh Pant hit five boundaries in eight balls
Kuldeep Yadav took three wickets to derail the Bangladesh chase
Hardik Pandya scored a fifty and broke India free of their second lull
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's partnership has yet to click at this T20 World Cup
India are packing their middle order with six-hitters to post par-plus totals in tough conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
India are on the brink of qualifying for the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tanzim Hasan was Bangladesh's best bowler, doing the one thing a big-hitter hates by being unpredictable
Rishad Hossain has arrived at this T20 World Cup as Bangladesh's most exciting cricketer
